name: template-engine-ts
description: A flexible and powerful templating engine for dynamic content generation.

scripts.build:parsers: mkdir -p lib && peggy --format es src/grammar.peggy -o lib/parser.js && peggy --format es src/grammar_new.peggy -o lib/parser_new.js
scripts.build: npm run build:parsers && npm run build:bundle
scripts.build:standalone:linux: npm run build && npm run sea:blob && ./scripts/build-sea-linux.sh
scripts.build:standalone:macos: npm run build && npm run sea:blob && ./scripts/build-sea-macos.sh
scripts.build:standalone:windows: npm run build && npm run sea:blob && ./scripts/build-sea-windows.sh
